key.name: first-time
key.summary: Whether the extension is run for the first time.
key.description: Whether the extension is run for the first time.

key.name: advanced
key.description: Whether to show advanced preferences.

key.name: icons-order
key.description: New icons are shown according to this sequence or at the end.

key.name: icons-show-all
key.summary: Whether to show icons from all workspaces.
key.description: If true icons form all workspaces are shown.

key.name: yawl-panel-position
key.description: The position of the left side of the YAWL panel as percentage of the top panel width.

key.name: yawl-panel-width
key.description: The width of the YAWL panel as percentage of the top panel width.

key.name: move-center
key.summary: Move central panel to the right.
key.description: If true the central panel is moved to the right.

key.name: hide-activities
key.description: If true the Activities button is hidden.

key.name: preserve-hot-corner
key.description: If true the Hot Corner is available even if the Activities button is hidden.

key.name: hide-app-menu
key.description: If true the AppMenu button is hidden.

key.name: panel-background
key.description: If true the top panel is painted with custom color and opacity.

key.name: panel-top-color
key.description: Custom color to paint top of the panel.

key.name: panel-top-opacity
key.description: Custom opacity to paint top of the panel.

key.name: panel-color
key.description: Custom color to paint the panel.

key.name: panel-opacity
key.description: Custom opacity to paint the panel.

key.name: icons-size
key.description: The size of application icons. The size is adjusted to be divisible by 8.

key.name: icons-faded
key.description: Whether to use faded icons (like AppMenu button).

key.name: icons-opacity
key.description: Icon opacity when not hovered (and when hovered if not otherwise set).

key.name: icons-opacity-other
key.summary: Opacity of app icons not on current workspace.
key.description: Opacity of app icons not on current workspace.

key.name: icons-opacity-inactive
key.summary: Opacity of not running favorite app icons.
key.description: Opacity of not running favorite app icons.

key.name: icons-clip-top
key.description: Clip icons on top (in pixels).

key.name: icons-clip-bottom
key.description: Clip icons on bottom (in pixels).

key.name: icons-align
key.description: Icons center alignment on the panel (%).

key.name: icons-distance
key.description: Distance between two icons as % of the icon size.

key.name: icons-animation-time
key.description: Icons animation time in ms. If 0 then no animation is used.

key.name: icons-animation-effect
key.description: Icons animation effect.

key.name: icons-hover-animation
key.summary: Whether to animate icons when hovered.
key.description: If true icons are animated (changing size etc.) when hovered.

key.name: icons-hover-size
key.summary: Size of hovered icon (% relative to unhovered).
key.description: Defines the size of the hovered icon in % relative to the unhovered one.

key.name: icons-hover-opacity
key.description: Defines the opacity of the hovered icon.

key.name: icons-hover-fit
key.summary: Whether to show full icon when hovered.
key.description: If true icons are shown full width when hovered.

key.name: icons-hover-animation-time
key.description: Icons animation time when hovered as % of animation time.

key.name: icons-hover-animation-effect
key.description: Icons animation effect when hovered.

key.name: icons-overview-show
key.summary: Whether to show icons in Overview.
key.description: If true icons are shown in Overview.

key.name: windows-show
key.description: If true the thumbnails of an application are shown when the app icon is hovered over.

key.name: windows-show-interesting
key.summary: Whether to show thumbnails of interesting windows only.
key.description: If true only the thumbnails of so-called interesting windows are shown.

key.name: windows-indicator-arrow
key.summary: Whether to use arrow-style thumbnail application indicator.
key.description: If true the indicator of the current thumbnails application is drawn as an arrow.

key.name: windows-theming
key.description: If true thumbnails a drawn using windows-padding etc.

key.name: windows-background-panel
key.summary: Whether to paint thumbnail panel with main panel background.
key.description: If true thumbnail panel background matches main panel background.

key.name: windows-background-color
key.description: Window thumbnail panel background color.

key.name: windows-background-opacity
key.description: Window thumbnail panel background background opacity.

key.name: windows-text-color
key.description: Window thumbnail panel text color.

key.name: windows-text-size
key.description: Window thumbnail panel text size in pt.

key.name: windows-border-color
key.description: Window thumbnail border color.

key.name: windows-border-width
key.description: Window thumbnail border width.

key.name: windows-border-radius
key.description: Window thumbnail border radius.

key.name: windows-padding
key.description: Window thumbnail padding.

key.name: windows-thumbnails-fit-height
key.summary: Whether to show all thumbnails same height.
key.description: If true then all thumbnails are same height.

key.name: windows-thumbnails-width
key.description: The width of window thumbnails.

key.name: windows-thumbnails-height
key.description: The height of window thumbnails.

key.name: windows-thumbnails-height-visible
key.description: Window thumbnail maximum visible height.

key.name: windows-thumbnails-opacity
key.description: Window thumbnails opacity when not hovered.

key.name: windows-thumbnails-minimized-opacity
key.description: Minimized window thumbnails opacity when not hovered.

key.name: windows-thumbnails-distance
key.description: Distance between window thumbnails as % of their widths.

key.name: windows-thumbnails-padding-top
key.description: Thumbnail top padding in pixels.

key.name: windows-show-delay
key.description: Window thumbnails showing delay time in ms.

key.name: windows-animation-time
key.description: Windows animation time in ms. If 0 then no animation is used.

key.name: windows-animation-effect
key.description: Windows animation effect.

key.name: windows-hover-opacity
key.description: Defines the opacity of the hovered window thumbnail.

key.name: windows-hover-fit
key.summary: Whether to show full window thumbnail when hovered.
key.description: If true window thuumbnails are shown full width when hovered.

key.name: windows-hover-animation-time
key.summary: Window thumbnails on hover animation time (%).
key.description: Window thumbnails animation time when hovered as % of animation time.

key.name: windows-hover-animation-effect
key.summary: Window thumbnails on hover animation effect.
key.description: Window thumbnails animation effect when hovered.

key.name: mouse-app-left
key.description: App left click/double click function.

key.name: mouse-app-left-ctrl
key.description: App ctrl-left click/double click function.

key.name: mouse-app-left-shift
key.description: App shift-left click/double click function.

key.name: mouse-app-left-ctrl-shift
key.description: App ctrl-shift-left click/double click function.

key.name: mouse-app-middle
key.description: App middle click/double click function.

key.name: mouse-app-middle-ctrl
key.description: App ctrl-middle click/double click function.

key.name: mouse-app-middle-shift
key.description: App shift-middle click/double click function.

key.name: mouse-app-middle-ctrl-shift
key.description: App ctrl-shift-middle click/double click function.

key.name: mouse-app-scroll
key.description: App mouse scroll function.

key.name: mouse-app-scroll-no-launch
key.summary: Do not launch apps with scroll.
key.description: Do not launch apps with scroll.

key.name: mouse-app-right
key.description: App right click/double click function.

key.name: mouse-window-left
key.description: Window left click function.

key.name: mouse-window-left-ctrl
key.description: Window ctrl-left click function.

key.name: mouse-window-left-shift
key.description: Window shift-left click function.

key.name: mouse-window-left-ctrl-shift
key.description: Window ctrl-shift-left click function.

key.name: mouse-window-middle
key.description: Window middle click function.

key.name: mouse-window-scroll-up
key.description: Window mouse scroll up function.

key.name: mouse-window-scroll-down
key.description: Window mouse scroll down function.

key.name: mouse-window-right
key.description: Window right click function.

key.name: mouse-drag-and-drop
key.description: If true mouse drag-and-drop events will be send as well.

key.name: mouse-click-release
key.summary: Whether to send clicks on mouse release.
key.description: If true mouse clicks are sent when mouse button is released rather than pressed.

key.name: mouse-long-click
key.summary: Whether to emulate right-click with long left-click.
key.description: If true long mouse left button click emulates mouse right button click.

key.name: mouse-scroll-timeout
key.description: Mouse single scroll time (to prevent multiple scrolls).

key.name: mouse-clicks-time-single
key.description: Single clicks time.

key.name: mouse-clicks-time-double
key.description: Double clicks time.

key.name: mouse-clicks-time-threshold
key.description: Mouse single/double clicks time threshold.

key.name: animation-disable
key.description: Whether to disable all animation.

key.name: animation-alternative-test
key.summary: Whether to use alternative animation engine.
key.description: Whether to use alternative animation engine.

key.name: animation-alternative-fps
key.description: Alternative animation engine fps.

key.name: debug
key.description: Whether to open debug window.

key.name: debug-bottom
key.summary: Whether to place debug window at the bottom of the first monitor.
key.description: If true then the debug window is placed at the bottom of the first monitor.

key.name: debug-width
key.summary: Debug window width as % of the monitor width.
key.description: Debug window width as % of the monitor width.

key.name: debug-force
key.summary: Whether to force all debug messages.
key.description: Whether to force all debug messages.

key.name: icons-drag-and-drop
key.description: Rearrange icons on the panel using mouse.

key.name: mouse-scroll-workspace
key.description: Mouse scroll to change workspace.

key.name: mouse-scroll-workspace-search
key.summary: Mouse scroll to find app's windows on other workspaces when thumbnails are shown.
key.description: Mouse scroll to find app's windows on other workspaces when thumbnails are shown.

key.name: icons-attention-blink
key.summary: Whether to blink on window attention.
key.description: If true the app icon will blink if its window demands attention.

key.name: icons-attention-blink-rate
key.description: Blinking rate (times per minute).

key.name: app-quicklists
key.summary: Whether to use quicklists in menus.
key.description: If true and Quicklists extension is enabled then use quicklists in menus.

key.name: icons-favorites
key.summary: Whether to always show icons of favorite apps.
key.description: If true icons of favorite apps are always shown.

key.name: icons-favorites-smaller
key.summary: Whether to make icons of not running favorite apps smaller.
key.description: If true icons of not running favorite apps are smaller.

key.name: icons-favorites-size
key.summary: The size of icons of not running favorite apps.
key.description: The size of icons of not running favorite apps.

key.name: icons-windows-indicator
key.summary: The type of app icon windows indicator.
key.description: The type of app icon windows indicator.

key.name: icons-windows-indicator-color
key.summary: The color used for app icon windows indicator.
key.description: The color used for app icon windows indicator.

key.name: windows-preview
key.summary: Whether to preview a window when its thumbnail is hovered.
key.description: If true the window is shown on top when its thumbnail is hovered.

key.name: windows-preview-dim-color
key.summary: Dim the screen when a preview of a window is shown: color.
key.description: Dim the screen when a preview of a window is shown: color.

key.name: windows-preview-dim-opacity
key.summary: Dim the screen when a preview of a window is shown: opacity.
key.description: Dim the screen when a preview of a window is shown: opacity.

key.name: windows-preview-panel-opacity
key.summary: Makes thumbnail panel transparent when previews are on.
key.description: Makes thumbnail panel transparent when previews are on.
